rules_text: Whenever you complete a bounty, you gain 3 life. [i](You complete a bounty when a permanent you don't control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“That's ‘cause droids don't pull people's arms out of their socket when they lose. Wookiees are known to do that.”
—Han Solo to C-3PO[/i]
